amendment.description: To modify certain security procedures of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence regarding public disclosure of classified information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4035 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4035 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10900) To modify certain security procedures of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence regarding public disclosure of classified information.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4035 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4035 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3981.
